steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 33-2011. A 56-year-old 
man with hypophosphatemia.
Bergwitz C(1), Collins MT, Kamath RS, Rosenberg AE.

Author information:
(1)Division of Endocrinology, Massachusetts General Hospital, and Department of 
Medicine, Harvard Medical School, Boston, USA.

DOI: 10.1056/NEJMcpc1104567
PMCID: PMC4907641
PMID: 22029985 [Indexed for MEDLINE]

Conflict of interest statement: Dr. Rosenberg reports receiving consulting fees 
from Genzyme. No other potential conflict of interest relevant to this article 
was reported.
